description: Try our easy to follow Beetroot Hummus recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Beetroot Hummus Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: vegie sticks (or brown rice crackers, to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Place beetroot, chickpeas, lemon juice, tahini, garlic, spices, a pinch of salt and 2 tbs water in a food processor and pulse to combine.
With the motor running, slowly drizzle in the olive oil and process until smooth and creamy. Transfer to a bowl and serve immediately with veggie sticks or rice crackers.
